name: <%= slugify(project) %>-server
description: <%= slugify(projectName) %> built with node + typescript + react

scripts.build: rm -rf public && npm run generate-build-version && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run --prefix ../client build && npm run compile:prod
scripts.deploy:dev: CLOUDSDK_CORE_PROJECT=<%= slugify(project) %>-dev npm run deploy && TAG_NAME=dev/`date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S` && git tag -a $TAG_NAME -m 'dev deployed' && git push origin $TAG_NAME
scripts.deploy:uat: CLOUDSDK_CORE_PROJECT=<%= slugify(project) %>-uat npm run deploy && TAG_NAME=uat/`date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S` && git tag -a $TAG_NAME -m 'uat deployed' && git push origin $TAG_NAME
scripts.deploy:prod: CLOUDSDK_CORE_PROJECT=<%= slugify(project) %>-prod npm run deploy && TAG_NAME=prod/`date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S` && git tag -a $TAG_NAME -m 'prod deployed' && git push origin $TAG_NAME
scripts.deploy: INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false npm run build && gcloud app deploy cron.yaml index.yaml app.yaml --quiet
